reviewText: Great book and I leaned a lot from reading it. Well I passed the test any how. Thanks

There are a few factors in commentary that are more opinion than history and should be more clearly delineated as such. But a great addition to an actively homeschooling parent who knows the history and can make that distinction in lecture. Testing features in the bonus menu are fantastic. A little bit dry.. but gets the job done.
Excellent video.  I would recommend it to supplement teaching the Declaration at the high school or college level. Good recourse source

I really enjoy learning about the important documents of our great country and how they came to be.  Watching DVDs is  a great way for me to learn.  I have enjoyed the information on this DVD.  Great purchase.
